name: Gattaimari
description:
[[Intro]]

Gattaimari is a Katamari/Super Robot inspired game where you play as Ingrid, a galaxy defender that powers up her magnet-mech based on what kinds of objects you connect to!

[[Controls]]

WASD - movement

Q/E - Rotate Left/Right

[[Credits]]

[Art]

- Nicholas Borghini (@_nichow on twitter)

- Victor Avila (@un_avilable on twitter, @avilinho on instagram)

[Programming]

- Vitor Milioni (@Milionissimo on twitter)

- Shizamura (@shizamura on twitter)
